text: Peter Ayodele Curtis Joseph (8 November 1920 – 15 December 2006) was born in Ikare, Nigeria. He was one of the few Africans to receive a Lenin Peace Prize but the first Nigerian to receive a Lenin Peace Prize in 1965.Yearbook of the Great Soviet Encyclopedia (in Russian). Moscow: Sovetskaya Enciklopediya. 1967. p. 623.Meddlesome MedalsSputnik Images == References == Category:1920 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Lenin Peace Prize recipients Category:People from Ondo State
title: Peter Ayodele Curtis Joseph
